title: Exquisite Mayura Jhumka: A Symphony of Rose Gold and Pink Sapphires
materials: natural Rubies. Featuring Hyderabadi polish for a radiant finish.
features: Intricately crafted peacock (Mayura) design, embellished with dazzling round-cut diamonds. The Jhumka showcases a beautiful floral cascade, adorned with vibrant pink sapphires. The peacock's eye is highlighted by a delicate ruby. Traditional filigree detailing enhances the overall elegance.
colors: and a touch of Ruby red. This combination evokes feelings of romance and prosperity.
occasions: or any special occasion where you want to make a statement. Also suitable for modern celebrations adding a touch of traditional charm.
description: A timeless blend of traditional South Indian design and modern elegance. The Mayura (peacock) symbolizes beauty and grace. Handcrafted by skilled artisans using the finest materials. A valuable addition to any jewelry collection.
